price: 54. Rustend op de banken, gevoerd met zijde brokaat en het fruit van de twee tuinen is binnen handbereik.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
